translated: Because prior to the state of that phenomenon‚Äôs arising, it is not a homogeneous cause, but later it is.

original: rtag tu skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtag tu skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not a homogeneous cause at all times.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs mang po zhig yod pa las tha ma'i gnas skabs gcig gis skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs mang po zhig yod pa las tha ma'i gnas skabs gcig gis skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par gyur pa yin na /
translated: If it is certain that a single final state among the many states of the future is a homogeneous cause,

original: de na de las gzhan pa nges par ma gyur pa yang mang mo zhig yod do //
analyzed: de na de las gzhan pa nges par ma gyur pa yang mang mo zhig yod do //
translated: But there are many other things that are not its homogeneous cause.

original: de las ni nam yang rgyu ma yin pa ma yin no zhes spyir gsungs te /
analyzed: de las ni nam yang rgyu ma yin pa ma yin no zhes spyir gsungs te /
translated: It is said in general that it is never a non-cause.

original: de lta bas na de ni lan du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de lta bas na de ni lan du mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, this is not a proper response.

original: de lta na ni gnas skabs 'di na yang @186b skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes de skad du brjod par nus so //
analyzed: de lta na ni gnas skabs 'di na yang @186b skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes de skad du brjod par nus so //
translated: In this case, it is possible to say that it is not a homogeneous cause.

original: chos gang zhig chos gang gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chos gang zhig chos gang gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: When a certain factor is the equivalent and immediately antecedent condition of a certain factor, this means that it is the equivalent and immediately antecedent condition of this factor.

original: yongs su rtog pa 'dis brjod par nus zhes bya ba ni chos de skye ba'i tshe'i gnas skabs na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid du nges par gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: yongs su rtog pa 'dis brjod par nus zhes bya ba ni chos de skye ba'i tshe'i gnas skabs na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid du nges par gyur pa yin te /
translated: It is possible to say this by way of this examination: when this factor arises, it is determined as the equivalent and immediately antecedent condition of that factor.

original: de'i phyir tha ma'i gnas skabs de las dgongs nas zhes bya ba'i yongs su rtog pa 'dis nam yang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin pa ma yin no zhes brjod par nus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha ma'i gnas skabs de las dgongs nas zhes bya ba'i yongs su rtog pa 'dis nam yang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin pa ma yin no zhes brjod par nus pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to say that it is never a similar immediately preceding condition, in consideration of that final state.

original: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes gsungs zhes bya ba ni gal te chos de ma 'ongs pa yin na de mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di skad du gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes gsungs zhes bya ba ni gal te chos de ma 'ongs pa yin na de mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Why is it said, ‚ÄúIf that phenomenon had not arisen?‚Äù It means that if that phenomenon were future, it would not be suitable as a similar immediately preceding condition.

original: tha ma'i gnas skabs smra ba de nyid kyis sgo gnyis su bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba rgyas par smras te /
analyzed: tha ma'i gnas skabs smra ba de nyid kyis sgo gnyis su bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba rgyas par smras te /
translated: In order to teach both sides, he who advocates the final state, says in detail.

original: der ji lta ba ste chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na smras pa nam yang ma yin no zhes 'byung ba de bzhin 'dir yang chos gang zhig chos gang gis mtshungs pa de
analyzed: der ji lta ba ste chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na smras pa nam yang ma yin no zhes 'byung ba de bzhin 'dir yang chos gang zhig chos gang gis mtshungs pa de
translated: It says: No, there is never such a case.üîΩSimilarly, here it says:

original: ma thag pa yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i ma yin pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ma thag pa yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i ma yin pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is there any phenomenon that is sometimes not the equivalent immediately preceding condition of a phenomenon that is its equivalent immediately preceding condition?üîΩIt says: No, there is never such a case.

original: smras pa / nam yang ma yin no zhes brjod par bya la /
analyzed: smras pa / nam yang ma yin no zhes brjod par bya la /
translated: Here, it says:

original: 'dir ji lta ba ste chos gang zhig chos gang gis mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ji lta ba ste chos gang zhig chos gang gis mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is there any phenomenon that is sometimes not the equivalent immediately preceding condition of a phenomenon that is its equivalent immediately preceding condition?

original: smras pa / gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes bya ba de lta bu bzhin du der yang chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: smras pa / gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes bya ba de lta bu bzhin du der yang chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: In the same way, is there ever a phenomenon that is not the cause of a phenomenon, when it is the cause of a phenomenon?

original: smras pa / gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: Reply: If that phenomenon were unarisen.

original: gal te chos de ma 'ongs pa yin na de'i rgyu'i rkyen du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gal te chos de ma 'ongs pa yin na de'i rgyu'i rkyen du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If that phenomenon is future, it would not be the causal condition of that phenomenon.

original: 'dir slob dpon gyis de lta yin na yon tan ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon gyis de lta yin na yon tan ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Here the master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna states, ‚ÄúIf that is so, what benefit is gained?‚Äù

original: de ltar sgo gnyis su bstan pa la yon tan ci yang mi thob bo //
analyzed: de ltar sgo gnyis su bstan pa la yon tan ci yang mi thob bo //
translated: In this way, no benefit is gained by teaching in two ways.

original: chos @187a * //
analyzed: chos @187a * //
translated: Phenomena

original: de ni skye ba'i tshe'i gnas skabs na dngos kyi tshul du rgyu'am mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin pa nyid pas de lta na 'di bstan bcos byed pa kha cig tu glags dang bcas par smra zhing kha cig tu glags med par smra ba mi mkhasüîΩpa kho nar yid ches par 'gyur te re zhig glags dang bcas pa ni chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: de ni skye ba'i tshe'i gnas skabs na dngos kyi tshul du rgyu'am mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin pa nyid pas de lta na 'di bstan bcos byed pa kha cig tu glags dang bcas par smra zhing kha cig tu glags med par smra ba mi mkhas pa kho nar yid ches par 'gyur te re zhig glags dang bcas pa ni chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na smras pa /
translated: When it is arising, it is not a direct cause or equivalent immediately preceding condition, so some who compose treatises say that it is sometimes possible and sometimes impossible.

original: nam yang ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa de yin no //
analyzed: nam yang ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa de yin no //
translated: This is the statement that it is never the case that any phenomenon is not the cause of any phenomenon.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: nam yang rgyu ma yin pa ma yin no zhes de skad du smras pa yang tha ma'i gnas skabs na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no zhes rjod par byed pas so //
analyzed: nam yang rgyu ma yin pa ma yin no zhes de skad du smras pa yang tha ma'i gnas skabs na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no zhes rjod par byed pas so //
translated: It is said that it is never not a cause, since it is said that it is a homogeneous cause in its final stage.

original: glags med pa ni gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin la skyes pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: glags med pa ni gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin la skyes pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthere is no opportunity‚Äù means that if that phenomenon has not arisen, it is not a similar immediately antecedent condition; but if it has arisen, it is a similar immediately antecedent condition.

original: 'dir dgongs pa'i don ni don gcig tu nges par rnam par bzhag nas yang gzhan du 'chad do snyam pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dgongs pa'i don ni don gcig tu nges par rnam par bzhag nas yang gzhan du 'chad do snyam pa yin no //
translated: The intended meaning here is that the meaning is determined as being one way, but it is explained in another way.üîΩTherefore, the former answer is better here.

original: de lta bas na 'dir lan snga ma kho na legs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir de ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir lan snga ma kho na legs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir de ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The meaning is that there is no fault because the statement was made with the three causes‚Äîcoexistent causes, concomitant causes, and causes of maturation‚Äîin mind.

original: 'o na gang 'di skad du gsungs so zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba 'di ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang 'di skad du gsungs so zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba 'di ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: But why was this statement made?

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa med pa kho na'o zhes bshad do //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa med pa kho na'o zhes bshad do //
translated: The statement, ‚ÄúThe future does not exist as a homogeneous cause,‚Äù was made with the three causes in mind.

original: de la gal te skal ba mnyam par rgyu ma 'ongs pa med pa zhig yin no //
analyzed: de la gal te skal ba mnyam par rgyu ma 'ongs pa med pa zhig yin no //
translated: If the homogeneous cause is a cause only of that which is similar to itself, then the future factor, which has not yet arisen, will not be the homogeneous cause.

original: ci'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa ma gtogs par bshad /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa ma gtogs par bshad /
translated: Why does the S≈´tra not mention the future afflicted view of self?

original: ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: The future afflicted view of self is the effect of the homogeneous cause, but is not the homogeneous cause.

original: de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin zhe na /
translated: How can the future afflicted view of self not be the homogeneous cause of the afflicted view of self?

original: re zhig lhan cig mi 'byung ba'i phyir lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig lhan cig mi 'byung ba'i phyir lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the co-existent cause or the associated cause of the afflicted view of self, because it does not coexist with the afflicted view of self.

original: lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not the ripening cause, because it is not neutral.

original: thun mong pa nyid kyis mi bgrang ba'i phyir byed rgyu'i rgyu yang ma yin pas rgyu zhig @187b yin na shugs kyis na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'am kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thun mong pa nyid kyis mi bgrang ba'i phyir byed rgyu'i rgyu yang ma yin pas rgyu zhig @187b yin na shugs kyis na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'am kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not a homogeneous cause because it is not counted as a common locus of both afflicted and unafflicted states. It is not an active cause because it is not counted as a common locus of both past and present states. Therefore if it is a cause, it is implicitly a homogeneous cause or a pervasive cause.

original: 'dir ni kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu kho na yin no //
translated: Here it is only a pervasive cause and a homogeneous cause.

original: de'i phyir gal te 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin na ci'i phyir 'di mu gsum pa'i don du ma gtogs par bshad ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin na ci'i phyir 'di mu gsum pa'i don du ma gtogs par bshad ce na /
translated: If future afflicted view of the self is not a homogeneous cause of afflicted view of the self, why is it not included in the meaning of the third possibility?

original: bye brag tu smra bas de ni 'di skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa zhes brjod par bya zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra bas de ni 'di skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa zhes brjod par bya zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Vaibhasikas say: It should be stated that future afflicted view of the self is the homogeneous cause of the truth of suffering concomitant with afflicted view of the self, excluding the truth of suffering that is concomitant with afflicted view of the self.

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa kho na ma gtogs par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa kho na ma gtogs par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: It should be stated that it is excluded only from that concomitant with afflicted view of the self.

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the afflicted view of the self.

original: tshor ba la sogs pa de ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa de ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus ni ma yin no //
translated: Feeling, etc., are the cause of the afflicted view of the self because they are coemergent causes and conjoined causes. They are also the effect of the afflicted view of the self because they are the effect of the cause of the afflicted view of the self. But they are not homogeneous causes of the afflicted view of the self.

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang zhes 'byung ba 'di ni nyams pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang zhes 'byung ba 'di ni nyams pa yin te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfuture afflicted view of the self‚Äù is defective.

original: tshig 'og ma la yod pa de zhes bya ba'i sgra dang lhan cig gdon par mi bya'i mtshungs par ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i khyad par du bya ba'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes tshig 'di gnyis bsdusüîΩte gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig 'og ma la yod pa de zhes bya ba'i sgra dang lhan cig gdon par mi bya'i mtshungs par ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i khyad par du bya ba'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes tshig 'di gnyis bsdus te gdon par bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù should not be read in conjunction with the following phrase. The two phrases ‚Äúfuture afflicted view of the self‚Äù and ‚Äúthat which is associated with it‚Äù should be read together in order to specify that it is associated with the truth of suffering.

original: yang na don gyis na de ltar go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te de skad du 'don par mi byed na /
analyzed: yang na don gyis na de ltar go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te de skad du 'don par mi byed na /
translated: Or, it should be understood in this way by implication. If one does not read the passage in this way,

original: bshad pa las 'byung ba dang mthun par 'don pa ni brtsan pa ma yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //üîΩ'o na btags pa'i bshad pa chos thams cad ni bzhi tshan du nges pa yin te zhes gsungs pa 'di ji ltar drang zhes bya ba la klan ka ba'i bsam pa ni rgyur nges pa ni chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa'i chos de ni nam
analyzed: bshad pa las 'byung ba dang mthun par 'don pa ni brtsan pa ma yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no // 'o na btags pa'i bshad pa chos thams cad ni bzhi tshan du nges pa yin te zhes gsungs pa 'di ji ltar drang zhes bya ba la klan ka ba'i bsam pa ni rgyur nges pa ni chos gang zhig chos gang gi rgyu yin pa'i chos de ni nam
translated: I think that it is not correct to explain the order of the four conditions in accordance with the order in which they are mentioned in the commentary.üîΩIf that is so, how do you interpret the statement in the commentary to the Abhidharmasamuccaya that ‚Äúall phenomena are definitely included in four groups‚Äù?

original: yang chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: The opponent thinks: A phenomenon that is definitely a cause of a certain phenomenon is never not a cause of that phenomenon.

original: dus gsum char na yang rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩde bzhin du 'bras bur nges pa ni chos gang zhig chos gang gi 'bras bu yin pa ste rgyu mthun pa la sogs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: dus gsum char na yang rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de bzhin du 'bras bur nges pa ni chos gang zhig chos gang gi 'bras bu yin pa ste rgyu mthun pa la sogs par sbyar ro //
translated: It is a cause in all three times.üîΩSimilarly, a phenomenon that is definitely an effect of a certain phenomenon is never not an effect of that phenomenon.

original: de bzhin du rten du nges pa ni mig la @188a * //üîΩsogs pa'i chos gang zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa chos gang gi rten yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rten du nges pa ni mig la @188a * //üîΩsogs pa'i chos gang zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa chos gang gi rten yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Similarly, a phenomenon that is definitely a support of a certain phenomenon is never not a support of that phenomenon.üîΩThe meaning of the passage is that the four conditions are definitely included in the four effects.

original: de bzhin du dmigs par nges pa ni gzugs la sogs pa chos gang zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa chos gang gi dmigs pa yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dmigs par nges pa ni gzugs la sogs pa chos gang zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa chos gang gi dmigs pa yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: So too, objects of observation are ascertained by asking, ‚ÄúWhich phenomena such as form are the objects of observation of which phenomena such as eye consciousness?‚Äù

original: des na chos rnams rgyur nges pa'i phyir dus gsum char yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no snyam pa yin no //
analyzed: des na chos rnams rgyur nges pa'i phyir dus gsum char yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no snyam pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since phenomena are ascertained as causes, all three times are homogeneous causes.

original: bye brag tu smra bas lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu las dgongs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /üîΩ'dir rgyu ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra bas lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu las dgongs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir smras pa / 'dir rgyu ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin gyi skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag ni ma yin te /
translated: Vaibhasikas say that there is no error because this is stated from the perspective of coemergent causes and concomitant causes.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs su rnam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs su rnam par ma bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here cause refers to concomitant causes and coemergent causes, but not to homogeneous causes and omnipresent causes because they are not posited in the future.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma yin te /
translated: They are also not karmic maturation causes.

original: mi g-yo ba ma yin pa'i las kha cig tshe rabs gzhan du yang rnam par smin pa mi 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba ma yin pa'i las kha cig tshe rabs gzhan du yang rnam par smin pa mi 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because some non-indeterminate karma does not yield its ripened effect in another lifetime.

original: 'bras bu ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu yin te /
translated: Its effects are the effect of human action and the effect of dominance,

original: de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because these two are the effects of co-existent causes and concomitant causes.

original: bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi gzhung lugs ni ma 'ongs pa yod bzhin du skye'o zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi gzhung lugs ni ma 'ongs pa yod bzhin du skye'o zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
translated: The VaibhƒÅ·π£ika position is that future states arise when they exist.

original: de lta bas na 'di skad du de na ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pa las da ltar gyi gnas skabs na rgyu yin par gyur pa ma yin nam zhes thal bar sgrub ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di skad du de na ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pa las da ltar gyi gnas skabs na rgyu yin par gyur pa ma yin nam zhes thal bar sgrub ste /
translated: Therefore, it is argued that the following consequence would ensue: ‚ÄúIf it is not the case that a future state is not a homogeneous cause and then becomes a homogeneous cause in the present,üîΩthen it would be necessary to say that it becomes a homogeneous cause.‚Äù

original: gyur zhes bya ba ni thal bar gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gyur zhes bya ba ni thal bar gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúIt would be necessary to say‚Äù means ‚Äúit would be a consequence that one would have to say.‚Äù

original: gnas skabs la ni 'dod pa kho na yin gyi rdzas la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid kyi gnas skabs ni sngon ma byung ba las dbyung ngo zhes bya ba kho nar 'dod kyi rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni
analyzed: gnas skabs la ni 'dod pa kho na yin gyi rdzas la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid kyi gnas skabs ni sngon ma byung ba las dbyung ngo zhes bya ba kho nar 'dod kyi rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni
translated: The state is asserted to be that which is derived from what has not previously existed, but the substance‚Äôs own characteristics

original: sngon ma byung ba las dbyung ngo zhes bya bar ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon ma byung ba las dbyung ngo zhes bya bar ma yin no //
translated: are not derived from what has not previously existed.üîΩThe collection is the result of the state, not the result of the substance.

original: tshogs pa ni gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu can yin gyi rdzas kyi 'bras bu can ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa ni da ltar gyi gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu can yin gyi rdzas kyi ni ma yin te 'di ltar chos de ni
analyzed: tshogs pa ni gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu can yin gyi rdzas kyi 'bras bu can ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa ni da ltar gyi gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu can yin gyi rdzas kyi ni ma yin te 'di ltar chos de ni
translated: The collection of causes and conditions is the result of the present state, not the result of the substance, because although that phenomenon

original: ma 'ongs pa @188b yin yang rdzas su yod la da ltar byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa @188b yin yang rdzas su yod la da ltar byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: exists as a substance in the future, it does not exist in the present.

original: klan ka pas cir 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba rgyas par smras pa dang bye brag tu smra bas bstan bcos las de smos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: klan ka pas cir 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba rgyas par smras pa dang bye brag tu smra bas bstan bcos las de smos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The Vaibhasikas say: That would be mentioned in the treatise.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa de smos pa yang med de bstan bcos de las dge ba'i rtsa ba ma 'ongs pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no zhes ni ma bshad do //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa de smos pa yang med de bstan bcos de las dge ba'i rtsa ba ma 'ongs pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no zhes ni ma bshad do //
translated: Also, that future homogeneous cause is not mentioned in the treatise, because the treatise does not explain that future roots of virtue are homogeneous causes of future roots of virtue.üîΩWhat would be the problem?üîΩThe Vaibhasikas say: That would be mentioned in the treatise.

original: klan ka pas 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dzin par byed nus pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: klan ka pas 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dzin par byed nus pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: The opponent says: What is able to produce and hold its result?

original: klan ka ba'i bsam pa ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa yod mod kyi de ni 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dzin par byed nus pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: klan ka ba'i bsam pa ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa yod mod kyi de ni 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dzin par byed nus pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The opponent thinks: Although a future homogeneous cause exists, it is not able to produce and hold its result.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba gang yin pa 'bras bu smin par byed nus pa dang 'bras bu 'phen par byed nus pa de kho na smos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba gang yin pa 'bras bu smin par byed nus pa dang 'bras bu 'phen par byed nus pa de kho na smos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said that only past and present homogeneous causes that are able to generate results and able to project results are homogeneous causes.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa smos pa la nyes pa med de /
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa smos pa la nyes pa med de /
translated: There is no error in stating that future states are homogeneous causes,

original: de la 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dzin par byed pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dzin par byed pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not have the power to generate or retain results.

original: de lta bas na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa yod mod kyi 'on kyang bstan bcos las ma bshad do snyam pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa yod mod kyi 'on kyang bstan bcos las ma bshad do snyam pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, although future states are homogeneous causes, they are not mentioned in the treatise.

original: bye brag tu smra bas de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra bas de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Vaibhasikas say: That is not so.

original: de ni rung ba ma yin te /üîΩrgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i //
analyzed: de ni rung ba ma yin te / rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i //
translated: That is not correct.üîΩBecause it is said:

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang / rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang / rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Natural outflow is similar to its cause.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin na /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin na /
translated: If homogeneous causes possess natural outflow results,

original: de yang ma 'ongs pa la rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma 'ongs pa la rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: then it is illogical for them to exist in the future.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu de rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu de rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is illogical for future states to be natural outflow results.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: snga phyi med pa'i phyir te /üîΩma 'ongs pas gnas skabs na ni 'di ni snga ma'o //
analyzed: snga phyi med pa'i phyir te / ma 'ongs pas gnas skabs na ni 'di ni snga ma'o //
translated: Because they do not exist earlier or later.

original: 'di ni phyi ma'o zhes bya bar yongs su mi chod de /
analyzed: 'di ni phyi ma'o zhes bya bar yongs su mi chod de /
translated: When future states exist, they cannot be ascertained as earlier or later.

original: 'chol bar 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chol bar 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are mixed up.

original: snga phyi med na ni 'dra ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang 'dra ba yin par yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: snga phyi med na ni 'dra ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang 'dra ba yin par yang mi rung ngo //
translated: If they do not exist earlier or later, then it is illogical for them to be similar or to be natural outflow.

original: 'on te skyes pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun par 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te skyes pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun par 'dod do zhe na /
translated: But if you assert that future states are the natural outflow of past and present states,

original: de'i phyir byung zin pa yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun par mi rung ste zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir byung zin pa yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun par mi rung ste zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: then it is illogical for past and present states to be the natural outflow of future states.

original: dper @189a * //
analyzed: dper @189a * //
translated: For example,

original: na da ltar gyi rgyu mthun pa 'das pa ma yin pa de bzhin du byung zin pa yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun pa yin par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: na da ltar gyi rgyu mthun pa 'das pa ma yin pa de bzhin du byung zin pa yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun pa yin par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as the present is not the natural outflow of the past, so also what has already occurred is not suitable as the natural outflow of the future.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu bas 'bras bu snga na ni mi rung bas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rgyu bas 'bras bu snga na ni mi rung bas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because it is illogical for the result to precede the cause.

original: skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that would be illogical.üîΩBecause it is illogical for the result to be simultaneous with the cause.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu snga ba dang lhan cig pa mi rung ba'i phyir la zhes bya ba ni rgyu bas 'bras bu snga na mi rung bas snga pa yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu snga ba dang lhan cig pa mi rung ba'i phyir la zhes bya ba ni rgyu bas 'bras bu snga na mi rung bas snga pa yang mi rung ngo //
translated: Because it is illogical for the result to precede the cause, it is also illogical for the result to be simultaneous with the cause.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs na lhan cig pa yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs na lhan cig pa yang mi rung ste /
translated: It is illogical for the result to be simultaneous with the cause in the future state.

original: de ltar byung ba'i gnas skabs na lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu bzhin du rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu lhan cig 'byung ba mi dmigs so /üîΩ// / bam po bco brgyad pa /
analyzed: de ltar byung ba'i gnas skabs na lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu bzhin du rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu lhan cig 'byung ba mi dmigs so /üîΩ// / bam po bco brgyad pa /
translated: Just as coemergent causes do not have a coemergent result in the present state, so also the cause of karmic maturation does not have a coemergent result in the present state.

original: de lta bas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus la yang snga phyi med pa'i phyir te ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'chol bar 'dug pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rgyu snga la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'phyi bar rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus la yang snga phyi med pa'i phyir te ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'chol bar 'dug pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rgyu snga la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'phyi bar rung ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the future does not have earlier and later parts, it is not tenable that the cause would be earlier and the result later, since the future is a confused state.

original: de'i phyir yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu bzhin du rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma 'ongs pa yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu bzhin du rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma 'ongs pa yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, like the homogeneous cause, the cause of karmic maturation would not be future.

original: bye brag tu smra bas de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra bas de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas say, that is not so.

original: de lta na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang zhes smras pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang zhes smras pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That is what is meant by the statement, ‚ÄúIn that case, the cause of karmic maturation would also be future.‚ÄùüîΩIt is illogical for them to be mutually concomitant causes.

original: phan tshun rgyu mthun pa nyid du ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni chos 'dra ba gang zhig gang gis skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i chos de nyid de kho na'i tshe de'i rgyu mthun pa yin par ji ltar rung ste
analyzed: phan tshun rgyu mthun pa nyid du ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni chos 'dra ba gang zhig gang gis skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i chos de nyid de kho na'i tshe de'i rgyu mthun pa yin par ji ltar rung ste
translated: How could the phenomenon that is a homogeneous cause of a particular phenomenon be its concomitant cause at the same time?

original: / bu rang gi pha nyid kyi pha de kho na'i tshe mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / bu rang gi pha nyid kyi pha de kho na'i tshe mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The son is not the father of his own father.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni de ltar thal bar mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni de ltar thal bar mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
translated: The cause of karmic maturation does not have this consequence.

original: snga phyi med bzhin du yang phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur te 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snga phyi med bzhin du yang phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur te 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: What is the consequence? It is not the case that there is no earlier or later, but it is the consequence that they are mutually cause and effect.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because cause and effect have different characteristics.

original: rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang // dge ba zag bcas rnams kho na //
analyzed: rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang // dge ba zag bcas rnams kho na //
translated: The cause of karmic maturation is only nonvirtue and virtue that is contaminated.

original: zhes bya ba dang / rnam smin lung du ma bstan chos //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / rnam smin lung du ma bstan chos //
translated: And it is said that the result of karmic maturation is a neutral phenomenon.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan no //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan no //
translated: Therefore, the characteristic of the cause is also different.

original: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúnature‚Äù is ‚Äúessence.‚Äù

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni mi dge ba nyid dang / dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni mi dge ba nyid dang / dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa nyid yin no //
translated: Its characteristic is nonvirtue and virtue that is contaminated.

original: 'bras @189b bu'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan te ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'bras @189b bu'i mtshan nyid kyang gzhan te ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid yin no //
translated: The characteristics of the effect are also different, for it is unobscured-non-defined.

original: de lta bas na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba gnas skabs kyis rnam par gnas pa ni gnas skabs las rnam par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba gnas skabs kyis rnam par gnas pa ni gnas skabs las rnam par gnas pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the state of being a homogeneous cause is established by state,

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni 'das pa'i gnas skabs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gnas skabs pa yin gyi ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni 'das pa'i gnas skabs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gnas skabs pa yin gyi ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: for a homogeneous cause is in the past or present state, but not in the future state.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni mtshan nyid las rnam par gnas pa yin te /üîΩmtshan nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni mtshan nyid las rnam par gnas pa yin te / mtshan nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: The state of being a ripening cause is established by characteristic,üîΩfor a ripening cause is in the present or future state, but not in the past state.üîΩThe characteristics of a ripening cause are as previously explained.

original: dus gsum char du yang mtshan nyid ji skad bshad pa bzhin yin pas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs mi dgag go //
analyzed: dus gsum char du yang mtshan nyid ji skad bshad pa bzhin yin pas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs mi dgag go //
translated: Therefore, the state of being a ripening cause is not refuted in the future state.

original: 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Here, this should be investigated:

original: ci ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'dra ba rnams 'chol bar 'dug pas 'di ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: ci ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'dra ba rnams 'chol bar 'dug pas 'di ni rgyu'o //
translated: In the future time, do dharmas of similar type exist in a confused state, so that one can say, ‚ÄúThis is the cause‚Äù?

original: 'di'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the result that resembles its cause.

original: zhes bya bar yongs su gcad mi nus te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar yongs su gcad mi nus te /
translated: But it is impossible to determine that this is the result that resembles its cause.

original: de'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa rnam par mi gzhag gam /
analyzed: de'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa rnam par mi gzhag gam /
translated: Therefore, do you not posit future homogeneous causes?

original: 'on te chos gang zhig gang gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i chos de rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis de'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin par yang 'gyur bas de'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa rnam par ma bzhag ce na /
analyzed: 'on te chos gang zhig gang gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i chos de rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis de'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin par yang 'gyur bas de'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa rnam par ma bzhag ce na /
translated: Or, do you not posit future homogeneous causes because any phenomenon that is a homogeneous cause of a given phenomenon is also its result that resembles its cause through the power of causes and conditions?

original: 'di rnam par bshad pa byed pa rnams kyis ni ma dpyad do //
analyzed: 'di rnam par bshad pa byed pa rnams kyis ni ma dpyad do //
translated: The Abhidharma masters have not analyzed this.

original: bdag ni phyogs snga ma 'di kho na ltar yin no snyam byed do //
analyzed: bdag ni phyogs snga ma 'di kho na ltar yin no snyam byed do //
translated: I think that the former position is correct.

original: ci de ltar nges sam zhe na zhes bya ba ni ci rang gi sa pa kho na'o zhes nges par bzung ba zhig yin nam 'on te de lta ma yin pa yang yod snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: ci de ltar nges sam zhe na zhes bya ba ni ci rang gi sa pa kho na'o zhes nges par bzung ba zhig yin nam 'on te de lta ma yin pa yang yod snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: Is it definite that way?

original: sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du //
analyzed: sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du //
translated: The path of the nine levels is mutually.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: üîΩüîΩ

original: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par du bya ba yin te /
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par du bya ba yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù indicates a distinction.üîΩThe path is the truth of the path.

original: lam zhes bya ba lam gyi bden pa yin par brjod par 'dod pas zag pa dang bcas pa las lam gyi bden pa khyad par du shes pa yin no //
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba lam gyi bden pa yin par brjod par 'dod pas zag pa dang bcas pa las lam gyi bden pa khyad par du shes pa yin no //
translated: The truth of the path is distinguished from contaminated states.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rang gi sa pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rang gi sa pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: The homogeneous cause of contaminated states is only of its own level.

original: gzhan gyi sa pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi sa pa ni ma yin la /
translated: It is not of another level.

original: lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni gzhan gyi sa pa yang yin no //üîΩsa smos na ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa yang gzung gi khams mos na ni zag pa @190a * //
analyzed: lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni gzhan gyi sa pa yang yin no // sa smos na ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa yang gzung gi khams mos na ni zag pa @190a * //
translated: But the homogeneous cause of the path is also of another level.üîΩIf the level is mentioned, then both contaminated and uncontaminated states are included.

original: bcas pa kho na gzung ste /
analyzed: bcas pa kho na gzung ste /
translated: But if the realm is mentioned, then only contaminated states are included.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni sa de dag tu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni sa de dag tu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is adventitious to those levels.

original: sa de pa'i sred pa dag gis bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir khams de dag tu gtogs pa ma yin zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sa de pa'i sred pa dag gis bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir khams de dag tu gtogs pa ma yin zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is not included in those realms because the craving of those levels does not appropriate it as its own.

original: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sred pa dag gis bdag gir mi byed do //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sred pa dag gis bdag gir mi byed do //
translated: Uncontaminated phenomena are not appropriated by the craving that is contaminated and that exists in the desire, form, and formless realms.

original: 'o na gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das pa dang lam mngon par 'dod pa de'i tshe ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das pa dang lam mngon par 'dod pa de'i tshe ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: But when one desires nirvana and the path, what is it then?

original: de ni chos la 'dun pa dge ba yin te /
analyzed: de ni chos la 'dun pa dge ba yin te /
translated: It is virtue that is aspiration for Dharma.

original: 'dod chags min te spang bya'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dod chags min te spang bya'i phyir //
translated: It is not attachment because it is to be abandoned.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since this is stated,

original: rigs mthun pa'i zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i rigs kyi'o //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'i zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i rigs kyi'o //
translated: similar means of the same uncontaminated type.

original: de lta na 'o na ni thams cad kyang thams cad kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni thams cad kyang thams cad kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhe na / de'i phyir / mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin //
translated: If that is so, then all would be homogeneous causes of all.

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore it says:üîΩThey are of equal status and higher status.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir phan tshun du zhes smos she na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir phan tshun du zhes smos she na /
translated: Why is it said that they are mutually?

original: sa gong ma pa dang sa 'og ma pa dag phan tshun du zhes de skad du bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sa gong ma pa dang sa 'og ma pa dag phan tshun du zhes de skad du bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is said that higher and lower levels are mutually.

original: sa gong ma pa yang sa 'og ma pa dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: sa gong ma pa yang sa 'og ma pa dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Also, those of higher level are homogeneous causes of those of lower level.

original: sa 'og ma pa yang sa gong ma pa dag gi yin no //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa yang sa gong ma pa dag gi yin no //
translated: Those of lower level are also homogeneous causes of those of higher level.

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni mnyam pa yin pas zag pa med pa de nyid ma 'ongs pa dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni mnyam pa yin pas zag pa med pa de nyid ma 'ongs pa dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang
translated: That is, since perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering is homogeneous, it is a cause of that uncontaminated perseverance itself in the future and it is a cause of the special states of Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering, perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of suffering,

original: / mi skye ba shes pa'i bar khyad par can gyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: / mi skye ba shes pa'i bar khyad par can gyi rgyu yin no //
translated: and up to the knowledge of nonarising.

original: dman pa'i ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dman pa'i ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a cause of inferior states.

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ma 'ongs pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ma 'ongs pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering does not become the homogeneous cause of future perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering.

original: mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig dag gi yin no zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam gzhan dang / bsgom pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas gsum gyi yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig dag gi yin no zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam gzhan dang / bsgom pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas gsum gyi yin no //
translated: The path of seeing is the homogeneous cause of another path of seeing, the path of meditation and the path of no more learning.

original: bsgom pa'i lam ni bsgom pa'i lam gzhan dang mi slob pa'i lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin gyi /üîΩmthong ba'i lam gyi ni ma yin pas @190b gnyis kyi yin no //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam ni bsgom pa'i lam gzhan dang mi slob pa'i lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin gyi / mthong ba'i lam gyi ni ma yin pas @190b gnyis kyi yin no //
translated: The path of meditation is the homogeneous cause of another path of meditation and the path of no more learning.

original: mi slob pa'i lam ni mi slob pa'i lam gzhan gyi yin gyi mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag gi ni ma yin pas gcig gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: mi slob pa'i lam ni mi slob pa'i lam gzhan gyi yin gyi mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag gi ni ma yin pas gcig gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The path of no more learning is the homogeneous cause of another path of no more learning.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa'i de la yang dbang po rtul po'i lam mthong ba'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i lam /
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa'i de la yang dbang po rtul po'i lam mthong ba'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i lam /
translated: Also refers to the path of seeing and so on. The path of seeing that is the nature of dull faculty is the cause of the path of seeing that is the nature of dull and sharp faculty.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kho na'i rgyu yin la dbang po rnon po'i lam ni dbang po rnon po'i lam kho na'i yin gyi dman pa'i phyir dbang po rtul po'i lam gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kho na'i rgyu yin la dbang po rnon po'i lam ni dbang po rnon po'i lam kho na'i yin gyi dman pa'i phyir dbang po rtul po'i lam gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: The path of sharp faculty is the cause of the path of sharp faculty alone, but it is not the cause of the path of dull faculty because it is inferior.

original: de bzhin du bsgom pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam la yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgom pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam la yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: So too, the path of meditation and the path of no learning should be expressed in the same way.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir 'di lta ste zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir 'di lta ste zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: To explain that, he says, for example,

original: gang zag dbang po rtul po gcig la yang lam drug car yod la rang bzhin gyis dbang po rnon po la ni gsum yod de /
analyzed: gang zag dbang po rtul po gcig la yang lam drug car yod la rang bzhin gyis dbang po rnon po la ni gsum yod de /
translated: one person with dull faculty has all six paths and one with sharp faculty by nature has three.

original: de la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni bdag nyid kyang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam gzhan dang bdag nyid kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs dang / bdag nyid kyang dad pas mos pa dang / mthong bas thob pa dang /üîΩdus kyi rnam par grol ba dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam skye ba dang mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi ci rigs par skal ba mnyam pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas drug gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni bdag nyid kyang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam gzhan dang bdag nyid kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs dang / bdag nyid kyang dad pas mos pa dang / mthong bas thob pa dang / dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam skye ba dang mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi ci rigs par skal ba mnyam pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas drug gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The path of one who follows by faith is the homogeneous cause of six: the other path of one who follows by faith, the path of one who obtains by seeing, the path of one liberated by the occasion, the path of one liberated not by the occasion, the path of one who obtains by means of faith and the path of one who obtains by seeing.üîΩThe path of one who obtains by seeing is the homogeneous cause of five: the other path of one who obtains by seeing, the path of one liberated by the occasion, the path of one liberated not by the occasion, the path of one who obtains by means of faith and the path of one who obtains by seeing.

original: dad pas mos pa'i lam ni dad pas mos pa'i lam gzhan dang mthong bas thob pa dang / dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam gzhan gsum gyi yin pas gzhi'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: dad pas mos pa'i lam ni dad pas mos pa'i lam gzhan dang mthong bas thob pa dang / dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam gzhan gsum gyi yin pas gzhi'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The path of one liberated by the occasion is the homogeneous cause of four: the other path of one liberated by the occasion, the path of one liberated not by the occasion, the path of one who obtains by means of faith and the path of one who obtains by seeing.üîΩThe path of one liberated not by the occasion is the homogeneous cause of three: the other path of one liberated not by the occasion, the path of one who obtains by means of faith and the path of one who obtains by seeing.üîΩThe path of one who obtains by means of faith is the homogeneous cause of three: the other path of one who obtains by means of faith, the path of one who obtains by seeing and the path of one liberated by the occasion.

original: dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam ni dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam gzhan dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i yin pas gnyis kyi skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam ni dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam gzhan dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i yin pas gnyis kyi skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The liberated path of the time of the result is the homogeneous cause of two: the liberated path of the time of the result and the unfixed liberated path.

original: dad pas mos pa'i lam ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam dag gi rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: dad pas mos pa'i lam ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam dag gi rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The path of one resolute in faith is not the cause of the path of one who is a follower by faith and the path of one who is a follower by the Dharma,

original: mthong ba'i lam dus snga ba'i phyir dang / bsgom pa'i lam yang khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam dus snga ba'i phyir dang / bsgom pa'i lam yang khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the path of seeing is earlier and the path of meditation is special.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar @191a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar @191a * //
translated: The same should be applied to the others.

original: par bya'o // chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam gzhan dang mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor ba rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams kyi yin pas gsum gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: par bya'o // chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam gzhan dang mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor ba rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams kyi yin pas gsum gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The path of one who is a follower by the Dharma is the homogeneous cause of three: the path of one who is a follower by the Dharma, the path of one who obtains results by insight, and the unfixed liberated path.

original: mthong bas thob pa'i lam ni mthong bas thob pa'i lam gzhan dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi yin pas gnyis kyi yin no //
analyzed: mthong bas thob pa'i lam ni mthong bas thob pa'i lam gzhan dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi yin pas gnyis kyi yin no //
translated: The path of seeing is the homogeneous cause of the path of seeing and the unfixed ƒÅrya path.

original: dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam gzhan kho na'i yin pas /
analyzed: dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam gzhan kho na'i yin pas /
translated: The unfixed ƒÅrya path is the homogeneous cause of the unfixed ƒÅrya path alone.

original: gcig gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: gcig gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: It is the homogeneous cause of one.

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The path of one who is resolute in faith is not the homogeneous cause of the path of one who is resolute in faith.

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the path of one who is resolute in faith is distinguished by faculty.

original: dad pas mos pa'i lam gyi yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dad pas mos pa'i lam gyi yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the homogeneous cause of the path of one who is resolute in the doctrine.

original: dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is distinguished by faculty.

original: 'o na ni dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam mthong bas thob pa dbang po'i sgo nas rgyu ma yin te dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam mthong bas thob pa dbang po'i sgo nas rgyu ma yin te dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But the path of seeing that is liberated from time is not a cause in terms of intellectual faculty, because it is a homogeneous cause that is superior in terms of intellectual faculty.

original: mi slob pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi slob pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not a cause in terms of intellectual faculty because it is subsumed by the path of no learning.

original: 'bras bu dus sngar byung la rgyu dus phyis byung ba ni ma yin no //üîΩmthong bas thob pa'i lam yang dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu dus sngar byung la rgyu dus phyis byung ba ni ma yin no // mthong bas thob pa'i lam yang dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the result occurs earlier and the cause later.

original: dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyang ji ltar zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sa gong ma pa bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste /üîΩci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi sa pa'i mthong ba'i lam mam /
analyzed: dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro // yang ji ltar zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sa gong ma pa bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste / ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi sa pa'i mthong ba'i lam mam /
translated: Also, the path of seeing that is obtained by seeing is not a homogeneous cause of the path of liberation from time because it is superior in terms of intellectual faculty.üîΩHow is it that the path of seeing and the path of meditation of higher realms are not homogeneous causes of the path of liberation from time?

original: bsgom pa'i lam mam /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam mam /
translated: The path of seeing and the path of meditation of higher realms are not homogeneous causes of the path of liberation from time.üîΩThe path of seeing and the path of meditation of higher realms are not homogeneous causes of the path of liberation from time.

original: mi slob pa'i lam ni ci rigs par sa 'og ma'i lam rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nas bzung ste /
analyzed: mi slob pa'i lam ni ci rigs par sa 'og ma'i lam rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nas bzung ste /
translated: The path of no more learning is equal or superior to the path of any level,üîΩfrom the base of infinite consciousness of the lower level

original: mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar gyi sa pa'i mthong ba'i lam mam /
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar gyi sa pa'i mthong ba'i lam mam /
translated: to the path of seeing,

original: bsgom pa'i lam mam /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam mam /
translated: the path of meditation,üîΩor the path of no more learning of the level of unrestricted access concentration.

original: mi slob pa'i lam dang ji ltar rigs par mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin ji ltar na yin par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mi slob pa'i lam dang ji ltar rigs par mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin ji ltar na yin par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sa 'og ma ni dman pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ@191b dbang po dang rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sa 'og ma ni dman pa'i phyir ro // @191b dbang po dang rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas te zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because the lower level is inferior.üîΩThe path is equal or superior due to the faculty and the cause that is its basis.üîΩThe path of seeing is equal or superior due to the faculty.

original: re zhig mthong ba'i lam la dbang po'i sgo nas lam mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam dang sa 'og ma'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam de nyid mnyam pa yin te gnyi ga yang dbang
analyzed: re zhig mthong ba'i lam la dbang po'i sgo nas lam mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam dang sa 'og ma'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam de nyid mnyam pa yin te gnyi ga yang dbang
translated: The path of seeing that is the faculty of possessing faith is equal to the path of seeing that is the faculty of possessing faith of the lower level.

original: po rtul po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: po rtul po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Both are inferior since both are the faculty of possessing faith.

original: de nyid pas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam sa 'og ma pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /üîΩdbang po rnon po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid pas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam sa 'og ma pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin te / dbang po rnon po'i phyir ro //
translated: The path of one higher in stage is superior to the path of one lower in stage because it is the path of one higher in stage and because it is the path of one higher in faculty.üîΩThe path of one higher in faculty is superior to the path of one lower in faculty because it is the path of one higher in faculty and because it is the path of one higher in stage.üîΩThe path of one higher in stage is superior to the path of one lower in stage because it is the path of one higher in stage and because it is the path of one higher in faculty.üîΩThe path of one higher in faculty is superior to the path of one lower in faculty because it is the path of one higher in faculty and because it is the path of one higher in stage.üîΩThe path of one higher in stage is superior to the path of one lower in stage because it is the path of one higher in stage and because it is the path of one higher in faculty.

original: de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam sa 'og ma pa dang mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam sa 'og ma pa dang mnyam pa yin no //
translated: The path of one higher in faculty is superior to the path of one lower in faculty because it is the path of one higher in faculty and because it is the path of one higher in stage.üîΩThe path of one higher in stage is superior to the path of one lower in stage because it is the path of one higher in stage and because it is the path of one higher in faculty.üîΩThe path of one higher in faculty is superior to the path of one lower in faculty because it is the path of one higher in faculty and because it is the path of one higher in stage.üîΩThe path of one higher in stage is superior to the path of one lower in stage because it is the path of one higher in stage and because it is the path of one higher in faculty.üîΩThe path of one higher in faculty is superior to the path of one lower in faculty because it is the path of one higher in faculty and because it is the path of one higher in stage.

original: de bzhin du dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa de dag nyid sa 'og ma pa'i bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam so sor sa dang dbang po'i bye brag gis tha dad pa dag dangüîΩci rigs par mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa de dag nyid sa 'og ma pa'i bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam so sor sa dang dbang po'i bye brag gis tha dad pa dag dangüîΩci rigs par mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The path of one higher in stage is superior to the path of one lower in stage because it is the path of one higher in stage and because it is the path of one higher in faculty.üîΩThe path of one higher in faculty is superior to the path of one lower in faculty because

original: de bzhin du bsgom pa'i lam la yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'i dad pas mos pa'i lam ni sa 'og ma pa'i dad pas mos pa'i lam dang mnyam pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgom pa'i lam la yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'i dad pas mos pa'i lam ni sa 'og ma pa'i dad pas mos pa'i lam dang mnyam pa yin te /
translated: So too, on the path of meditation, the path of resolute faith of the level of the base of nothingness is equal to the path of resolute faith of lower levels,

original: gnyi ga yang dbang po rtul po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang dbang po rtul po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both are of dull faculty.

original: de nyid pas sa 'og ma pa'i mthong bas thos pa'i lam khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid pas sa 'og ma pa'i mthong bas thos pa'i lam khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
translated: The path of seeing of lower levels is superior to that,

original: dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is of sharp faculty.

original: de bzhin du de nyid sa 'og ma pa'i dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam dang ni mnyam pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de nyid sa 'og ma pa'i dus kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam dang ni mnyam pa yin te /
translated: So too, that is equal to the path of liberation not associated with a level of lower level,

original: gnyi ga yang dbang po rtul po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang dbang po rtul po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both are of dull faculty.

original: de nyid pas sa 'og ma pa'i dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: de nyid pas sa 'og ma pa'i dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam khyad par can yin te /
translated: The special path of liberation not associated with a level of lower level is superior to that,

original: dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is of sharp faculty.

original: de bzhin du mi slob pa'i lam la yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mi slob pa'i lam ni ci rigs par sa 'og ma pa dang mnyam pa'am khyad par yin par sbyar bar bya ste phyogs 'dis sa thams cad sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi slob pa'i lam la yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mi slob pa'i lam ni ci rigs par sa 'og ma pa dang mnyam pa'am khyad par yin par sbyar bar bya ste phyogs 'dis sa thams cad sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: So too, in the path of no-more-learning, the path of no-more-learning of the base of nothingness is either equal or superior to the lower stages. This position should be applied to all stages.

original: rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas ji ltar sa gong ma pa'i sa 'og ma'i lam dang mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin zhe na /
analyzed: rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas ji ltar sa gong ma pa'i sa 'og ma'i lam dang mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin zhe na /
translated: How is the higher stage equal or superior to the lower stage in terms of the cause that expands it?

original: de'i phyir da la rgyus shin tu rgyas par @192a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir da la rgyus shin tu rgyas par @192a * //
translated: Therefore, it is said in detail:

original: byas pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa dang zhes bya ba 'di rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: byas pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa dang zhes bya ba 'di rgyas par smos so //
translated: The cause that expands it is the path of seeing and so on.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas ni bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam nye bar bsdus te /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas ni bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam nye bar bsdus te /
translated: Since the term and so on is mentioned, the path of meditation and the path of no-more-learning are included.

original: sa gong ma pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bas ni sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin no //
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bas ni sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin no //
translated: The cause that expands the perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering of the higher stage is superior to the cause that expands the Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering of the lower stage.

original: sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa bas kyang sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa nas sa gong ma pa'i lam la chos shes pa bas kyang sa 'og
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa bas kyang sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa nas sa gong ma pa'i lam la chos shes pa bas kyang sa 'og
translated: It is also distinguished by the cause of perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of suffering of lower level, which is more extensive than the cause of Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering of lower level.

original: ma pa'i lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i bar du rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: ma pa'i lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i bar du rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
translated: It is also distinguished by the cause of perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of path of lower level, which is more extensive than the cause of Dharma knowledge of the truth of path of higher level.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu lhag pa re res rgyas par byas pa'i phyir ro //üîΩsa gong ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam pas ni sa 'og ma pa'i bsgom pa'i lam rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /üîΩmthong ba'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rgyus rgyas par byas pa yin la /
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu lhag pa re res rgyas par byas pa'i phyir ro // sa gong ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam pas ni sa 'og ma pa'i bsgom pa'i lam rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te / mthong ba'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rgyus rgyas par byas pa yin la /
translated: This is because each additional homogeneous cause makes it more extensive.üîΩThe path of seeing of higher level is distinguished by the cause of the path of meditation of lower level, which is more extensive.üîΩThe path of seeing is made extensive by the cause of the path of seeing.

original: bsgom pa'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi rgyus rgyas par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi rgyus rgyas par byas pa yin no //
translated: The path of meditation is made extensive by the cause of the path of seeing and the path of meditation.

original: sa gong ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam dag pas kyang sa 'og ma pa'i mi slob pa'i lam rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam dag pas kyang sa 'og ma pa'i mi slob pa'i lam rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
translated: Also, the paths of seeing and meditation of higher levels are superior to the path of no learning of lower levels through the process of extensive generation of their causes.

original: mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam gyi rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam gyi rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they extensively generate the causes of the paths of seeing, meditation and no learning.

original: sa gong ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam dang sa 'og ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam du ni skad cig ma mthun pa la ltos na rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas mnyam pa yin te /
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam dang sa 'og ma pa'i mthong ba'i lam du ni skad cig ma mthun pa la ltos na rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas mnyam pa yin te /
translated: The path of seeing of higher levels and the path of seeing of lower levels are equal through the process of extensive generation of their causes, since they are similar in being moments.

original: bsgom pa'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam du dang mi slob pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam du yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam du dang mi slob pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam du yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The path of meditation and the path of meditation and the path of no learning and the path of no learning are similar to that.

original: de ltar na kha cig sa 'og ma pa nyid yin yang dbang po'i sgo nas mnyam pa yin la rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na kha cig sa 'og ma pa nyid yin yang dbang po'i sgo nas mnyam pa yin la rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
translated: Thus, some are equal in terms of faculty even though they are lower levels, but they are superior through the process of extensive generation of their causes.

original: dper na bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam pas sa 'og ma pa'i dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam dag @192b lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam pas sa 'og ma pa'i dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam dag @192b lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the path of one who is a follower through faith of the first absorption level is superior to the paths of one resolute in faith and one liberated by the occasion of the lower level.

original: kha cig ni dbang po dang rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: kha cig ni dbang po dang rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin te /
translated: Some are superior through the faculty and cause that generates it.

original: dper na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam pas sa 'og ma pa'i mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam dag lta bu'o //üîΩchung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa gong nas gong du'o zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam ma gtogs te /
analyzed: dper na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam pas sa 'og ma pa'i mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam dag lta bu'o // chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa gong nas gong du'o zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam ma gtogs te /
translated: For example, the path of one who is a follower through faith of the fourth absorption level is superior to the paths of one who obtains results by insight and one liberated regardless of occasion of the lower level.üîΩThe small of the small and so on are superior to the great of the great and so on.

original: de la chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This does not apply to the path of seeing because the small of the small and so on do not exist there.

original: de la sa gong ma pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu bas sa 'og ma pa'i chung ngu'i 'bring po nas chen po'i 'bring po bas chen po'i chen po'i bar du skad cig ma 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba la ltos nas rgyus rgyas pa byas pa'i sgoüîΩnas mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: de la sa gong ma pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu bas sa 'og ma pa'i chung ngu'i 'bring po nas chen po'i 'bring po bas chen po'i chen po'i bar du skad cig ma 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba la ltos nas rgyus rgyas pa byas pa'i sgo nas mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin te /
